title: Ownership Structure of LyondellBasell Industries NV Stock

content.text: As of the most recent filing, institutional investors collectively own approximately 76.17% of LyondellBasell Industries NV stock. The largest institutional shareholder is Vanguard Group, with a 7.94% stake in the company. Other significant institutional investors include BlackRock, which holds a 6.85% stake, and Capital Research & Management, with a 5.37% stake.

Insiders, including company executives and directors, have a considerable ownership stake in LyondellBasell Industries NV. As of the most recent filing, insiders hold approximately 0.90% of the company's stock. The largest insider shareholder is CEO Bob Patel, with a 0.31% stake, followed by CFO Thomas Aebischer, with a 0.09% stake.

Apart from institutional investors and insiders, the remaining portion of LyondellBasell Industries NV stock is held by individual retail investors and other smaller institutional investors. Detailed data on these shareholders is not readily available in the given sources.

news.headline: LyondellBasell Prices Public Offering of Guaranteed Notes
news.summary: LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB) announced today that LYB International Finance III, LLC, its wholly-owned subsidiary, priced a public offering (the "Offering") of $750,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 5.500% Guaranteed Notes due 2034 (the "Notes"). The Notes will be fully and unconditionally guaranteed by LyondellBasell. The Offering is expected to close on February 28, 2024, subject to the satisfaction of customary closing conditions.
